name: Casino-more
description:
Gambling can take you to dark places... but at some point, you have to draw the line.
You are going back into that casino,and getting your money back! No matter what it takes!

Enjoy this fast paced, speedrunner platformer that tests your skill with randomized abilities.

Whats your best time? and will you roll the dice to get a better run?

move around and cause chaos with a variety of weapons:

  • Shotgun - very standard. watch out for that knock back!
  • C4 - click to throw, then click to activate! great for setting up strategic jumps
  • Flamethrower -  most skill based weapon, make sure to jump for that extra boost!
  • Rocket Launcher - iconic isn't it? just shoot your feet!

climb up any walls with a grey line! (but not flat or blank walls)

click and drag your weapons to reorder them for optimal strategy!
